content: If you lost menu bar, press alt key If you lost 'new message' button, press view>folders>folder pane header To restore SEND button, click 'new message' and then click View>toolbars>composition toolbar (again, if menu bar is not showing, press alt key)
creator: davidsk

content: I have no idea why that is happening, but does the sig appear anywhere when using that setup? Does it appear if you change setting to appear at bottom? Is there HTML in the sig? If so, have you tried using a simple text sig to see if that works? My hope is those questions may help identify where the problem lies.
creator: davidsk

content: highlight the account on main pane, rightclick and select settings, then scroll down slightly in left side to 'account actions' menu and select to remove account.
creator: davidsk
